about.quote: Time is the only asset we can't recover. My focus is ensuring you never lose it in operations again.
about.p1: Zaeom was born from a brutal need for efficiency. We understand that modern entrepreneurs cannot be slaves to slow and flawed manual processes.
about.p2: We implement an intelligence architecture that learns from your business, allowing a scale that was previously impossible without tripling fixed costs.

faq.title: Insights & Protocols
faq.subtitle: The answers you need to understand the autonomy revolution.

questions.q1: How does Zaeom's AI integrate with my WhatsApp?
questions.a1: We use official APIs and proprietary infrastructure to ensure your AI responds in milliseconds, maintaining your brand personality and collecting precious data from every interaction.
questions.q2: What's the difference between a virtual assistant and Zaeom?
questions.a2: Assistants execute tasks. Zaeom implements systems. Our hybrid approach combines elite professionals with advanced automation, creating an infrastructure that scales on its own.
questions.q3: Are my and my customers' data safe?
questions.a3: Security is our foundation. We follow rigorous encryption and data sovereignty protocols, inspired by global high-security standards, to ensure your business intelligence remains private.
questions.q4: How quickly do I see the first results?
questions.a4: Initial setup takes an average of 7 days. However, the time savings are immediate from the first day your autonomy protocol is activated.

final_cta.title_part1: Is there real time left, or is your money still stuck in
final_cta.description: Leave Finance, Sales, and Marketing to those who breathe efficiency. Schedule your diagnostic and find out how much you can save by delegating to Zaeom.

privacy_modal.title: Privacy Policy

data_protection.title: Data Protection
data_protection.content: At Zaeom, the privacy and security of your operational data are our absolute priority. This policy details how we handle the information collected through our SOS (System).

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.content: We collect strictly necessary data for the operation of our AI protocols, including:
items: Contact Data: Name, email, and WhatsApp for appointments.
Usage Metadata: Technical information for operator performance optimization.
Operational Flows: Data voluntarily provided for custom model training.

usage.title: Data Usage
usage.content: Your data is used exclusively for:
items: Guaranteeing the security of hybrid infrastructure.
Direct communications about your Z-01 protocol status.

transparency.title: Total Transparency
transparency.content: We do not sell, share, or rent your data to third parties. Your company's most valuable asset is its business intelligence, and we protect it as such.

privacy_modal.footer: Last update: January 2026 â€¢ Zaeom Protocol
